AttachedContentNote.name: AttachedContentNote
AttachedContentNote.description: This read-only object contains all ContentNote objects associated with an object.

ContentSize.description: Size of the note in bytes.

FileExtension.description: File extension of the attached ContentNote.

FileType.description: Type of file for the note. All notes have a file type of SNOTE.

LinkedEntityId.description: ID of the record the ContentNote is attached to.

TextPreview.description: A preview of the note, up to 255 characters.
